meanings.sent1: The bright red sign was unmissable in the dark night.
meanings.sent2: The huge billboard on the highway was unmissable.
meanings.sent3: The giant inflatable balloon was unmissable at the fair.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak was unmissable against the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The loud alarm clock was unmissable in the quiet room.

meanings.definition: So good or important that it should not be missed
meanings.sent1: The unmissable movie premiere had a star-studded red carpet event.
meanings.sent2: The unmissable opportunity to travel abroad came once in a lifetime.
meanings.sent3: The unmissable chance to meet a celebrity made her day.
meanings.sent4: The unmissable concert left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The unmissable book signing drew a large crowd of fans.
